caption.p: The seasonal prevalence of common HCoVs in Western China, May 2016 to June 2019, at West China Hospital in Chengdu, China. Blue columns: the total number of patients; orange columns: patients older than 60 years old; gray columns: children and adolescents younger than 16 years old. The positive rate is calculated as the number of patients with coronaviral pneumonia in each age group divided by the number of patients with any viral pneumonia in the group.
